newHere.title: New Here?
newHere.description: Get personalized resources based on your interests, and needs. Visit our questionnaire to start your customized learning journey!

startKoreanJourney.title: Start Your Korean Journey!
startKoreanJourney.description: Unlock your potential and dive into the world of Korean language and culture. Join us today and take the first step towards mastering Korean!

readRewiews.title: Join Hundreds of Successful Learners
readRewiews.description: We've helped hundreds of learners achieve their Korean language goals. You can be the next one!

eLearning.title: Your Korean Mastery: Expert Courses Await!
eLearning.p1: Start your Korean fluency journey with our expert-led video lessons! Our curriculum supports all levels, from beginner to advanced.
eLearning.p2: Enjoy a variety of resources for daily conversations and exam prep, keeping your learning engaging and effective!

onlineClasses.title: Personalized Tutoring with Experienced Instructors
onlineClasses.p1: Discover the flexibility of our courses, whether you prefer personalized one-on-one sessions or engaging group classes.
onlineClasses.p2: Learn Korean with confidence alongside our experienced instructors who tailor each lesson to your individual needs.
